member.name: T:UnityEngine.WWWForm
member.summary: Helper class to generate form data to post to web servers using the UnityWebRequest or WWW classes.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WWWForm.headers
member.summary: (Read Only) Returns the correct request headers for posting the form using the WWW class.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.WWWForm.data
member.summary: (Read Only) The raw data to pass as the POST request body when sending the form.

member.summary: Add a simple field to the form.

member.summary: Add a simple field to the form.

member.summary: Add a simple field to the form.

member.summary: Add binary data to the form.

member.summary: Add binary data to the form.
